com.luigisgro.cqf.fdm
Class BaseGrid

java.lang.Object
  com.luigisgro.cqf.fdm.BaseGrid
All Implemented Interfaces:
Grid
Direct Known Subclasses:
FullGrid, TwoStepsGrid
public abstract class BaseGrid
extends java.lang.Object
implements Grid

Base class for implementing Grid objects. It holds the grid parameters, and it implements all the methods to access its contents

Author:
Luigi Sgro

                        Derivative d)
Description copied from interface: Grid
Validates the grid dimension and resolution with regard to the volatility and the derivative passed.

Specified by:
validate in interface Grid
Parameters:
vol - Volatility used in the analysis

getPresentInterpolated

public double getPresentInterpolated(double s)
Description copied from interface: Grid
Returns the value for time = 0, for any value of s within the stock range. Values of s that do not correspond to a grid point are calculated via linear interpolation

Specified by:
getPresentInterpolated in interface Grid
Parameters:
s - The stock value
Returns:
The interpolated grid value at present, s
